r.s: Provides missing functionality for older versions of PHP.
r.d: PHP_Compat provides missing functionality in the form of Constants and Functions and Enviroment settings for older versions of PHP.
r.n: Added more components: * html_entity_decode * version_compare * image_type_to_mime_type * array_key_exists * array_search * call_user_func_array * constant * ob_clean * ob_flush * ob_get_clean * ob_get_flush
